title: Looking for 1925 Exhibits Champions Babe Ruth

posts.post_title: Looking for 1925 Exhibits Champions Babe Ruth
posts.post_content: Please let me know if you have one you would be willing to sell.
one of my favorite poses of the babe!  Good luck!
Pete, I will offer you 3k and a proper pair of nail-clippers. Lol. That is a beauty.
dammit...i had a feeling the finger biting/picking would come back to "bite" me!!!!!
